hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e -v umask 0022
echo "Cleanup previous build" rm -rf rm -rf obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu reports/ /tmp/scan-build-*
echo "Cleanup" ./mach clobber
export MACH_NO_WRITE_TIMES=on
cat > .mozconfig <<EOF ac_add_options --enable-debug ac_add_options --disable-av1 # --disable-unified-compilation ac_add_options --enable-warnings-as-errors
mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS="-j20" EOF
echo "Apply patches on top of the hg repo" hg qpop -a hg qpush -a export PATH=$PATH:/var/lib/jenkins/.cargo/bin/ echo "Build using scan-build"
# cargo install cbindgen --force
# Ignore thirdparty code THIRDPARTY=$(cat tools/rewriting/ThirdPartyPaths.txt) EXCLUDES="--exclude /test/" for f in $THIRDPARTY; do EXCLUDES="$EXCLUDES --exclude $f" done
ALPHA_CHECKERS=$(scan-build-$CLANG_VERSION --help|grep alpha|grep -v alpha.osx|awk '{print "-enable-checker " $1}'|tr "\n" " ") echo $ALPHA_CHECKERS ALPHA_CHECKERS="-enable-checker alpha.cplusplus.DanglingInternalBuffer -enable-checker alpha.cplusplus.DeleteWithNonVirtualDtor -enable-checker alpha.cplusplus.IteratorRange -enable-checker alpha.cplusplus.MisusedMovedObject -enable-checker alpha.cplusplus.UninitializedObject " ALPHA_CHECKERS="-enable-checker alpha.cplusplus.UninitializedObject -enable-checker alpha.cplusplus.IteratorRange -enable-checker alpha.core.BoolAssignment" # -enable-checker alpha.core.IdenticalExpr # wait too many false positive # -enable-checker alpha.deadcode.UnreachableCode # Freezes the build # PATH=$PATH:/usr/share/clang/scan-build-py-$CLANG_VERSION/bin/ scan-build-py-$CLANG_VERSION $EXCLUDES -enable-checker optin.performance.Padding $ALPHA_CHECKERS -analyzer-config stable-report-filename=true -v ./mach --log-no-times build -v scan-build-$CLANG_VERSION --show-description $EXCLUDES -enable-checker optin.performance.Padding $ALPHA_CHECKERS -analyzer-config stable-report-filename=true -v ./mach --log-no-times build #-v # --show-description echo "Retrieve the last scan-build (-o of scan-build is failing)" SCAN_BUILD_DIR=$(ls -1d /tmp/scan-build-*|tail -1) mkdir -p reports/
echo "Move it" mv $SCAN_BUILD_DIR reports/fx-scan-build
echo "Set correct permissions" chmod o+rx reports/fx-scan-build/ chmod o+r reports/fx-scan-build/*
echo "Send it" rsync -arv -R reports/fx-scan-build/ sylvestre@batou.ecranbleu.org:/home/www/sylvestre.ledru.info/ ./mach clobber
rm -rf obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu reports/fx-scan-build/
